coindesk_news.name: CoinDesk News
coindesk_news.description: Get the latest crypto news from CoinDesk

params.label: Limit
params.description: The number of news articles to fetch

params.label: Language
params.description: The language of the news articles

params.label: Categories
params.description: Comma separated list of categories to fetch (e.g. 'bitcoin,ethereum')
